column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Two suspects have been charged for stealing a mobile phone.------This happened at 2:40 am on September 8
column4: 2018 in Khan Daun Penh.------The victim said that two suspects riding a motorbike grabbed his Ipone 6+ on Sihanouk Boulevard. His shouts brought attention and the pair were swiftly disengaged from their ride. Pre-dawnummary justice ensued------The first suspect
column6: a 29-year-old male is from Kandal province. ------. ------The second
column8: a 24-year-old male was riding the Honda Motorcycle 125  Phnom Penh 1FZ.8433.------Both suspects were then taken to the Toul Svay Prey 2 Administration Police Station to be questioned
